description: This file implements an in-memory, thread-safe repository for managing 'Note' objects, providing standard CRUD operations and implementing the INoteRepository interface.

classes.name: InMemoryNoteRepository
classes.description: A thread-safe in-memory storage class for notes that persists for the application's lifetime, implementing CRUD operations according to the INoteRepository interface.

methods.name: GetAll
methods.description: Returns all notes ordered by their 'UpdatedAt' timestamp in descending order.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its unique GUID identifier, or null if not found.

methods.name: Add
methods.description: Adds a new note to the in-memory storage.

methods.name: Update
methods.description: Updates an existing note; returns false if the note does not exist.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Removes a note identified by its GUID; returns true if successful.
